Reminder that if you add `do not edit by hand` at the top of a file, RStudio will show this small message. 

This won't prevent from actually editing the file, but it can be helpful as a visual reminder that users are not supposed to edit this file.

I teach and encourage students to use R markdown in my undergrad class and lab. But folks, I hate using markdown myself. I'm annoyed with all the scrolling and I want output in the console/plot area. Is something wrong with me? Or is markdown actually not that great? #Rstats
